comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Pic taken from the heights of South Brisbane, looking down what (pre Expo 88 and Southbank) was Stanley St, towards the damaged Victoria Bridge. Across the river to the right we see the city. Someone familiar with the view might be able to tell us whether this pic was taken from the South Brisbane town hall clock tower...I suspect it was taken from either the clock tower or from somewhere nearby. Compare with www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/7445359230/in/photo...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
